Package org.sakaiproject.tool.section.jsf

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RowGroupable
    Author:Louis Majanja Date: Jan 18, 2007 Time: 1:11:11 PM
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DivMessageRenderer
    Put the message in a "div" instead of a "span", allowing for much more positioning control.
    DivMessageRendererBase
    Base class for custom message renderers.
    DivMessagesRenderer
    Work around JSF 1.1's inadequate Messages renderer, which has the following problems: - Contrary to the documentation, an HTML list is not used to render a list.
    HtmlSortHeaderRenderer
    Based on org.apache.myfaces.custom.sortheader.HtmlSortHeaderRenderer.
    JsfTool
    Extension to the Sakai JsfTool servlet, computing the default page view depending on the user's role (permissions).
    JsfUtil
    A utility to help deal with common tasks in JSF.
    MessagingBean
    A session-scoped bean to handle jsf messages across redirects.
    RowGroupDataTable
    Author:Louis Majanja Date: Jan 18, 2007 Time: 1:07:09 PM
    RowGroupDataTableRenderer  
    RowGroupDataTableTag
    Author:Louis Majanja Date: Jan 18, 2007 Time: 1:07:44 PM
